stock.controller

Class StockControllerGUI.FeaturesImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • stock.controller.StockControllerGUI.FeaturesImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Features
    Enclosing class:
    StockControllerGUI

    public class StockControllerGUI.FeaturesImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Features
    Implements the feature interface to provide callback methods for the view. Each operation is mapped to a method providing the capability to read inputs as method arguments and pass those inputs to the model.

      • createStrategyDollarCost

        public void createStrategyDollarCost(java.lang.String strategyName,
                                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> tickerWeight,
                                     java.time.LocalDate start,
                                     java.time.LocalDate end,
                                     double amount,
                                     double commission,
                                     int frequency,
                                     boolean save,
                                     boolean apply,
                                     boolean load,
                                     java.lang.String portfolioInfo,
                                     boolean savePort)
        Description copied from interface: Features
        Creates a dollar cost strategy with all possible parameters present.
        Specified by:
        createStrategyDollarCost in interface Features
        Parameters:
        strategyName - name of the strategy
        tickerWeight - the weight ticker mapping for each symbol.
        start - the start date to begin investment from.
        end - the end date when the investment ends.
        amount - the amount to be invested in each investment.
        commission - the commission per transaction.
        frequency - the intervals in which strategy is executed.
        save - whether user wants to save this strategy.
        apply - whether user wants to execute this strategy.
        load - whether portfolio is loaded from disk
        portfolioInfo - the name or path of the portfolio.
        savePort - whether portfolio is to be saved after execution

                                  boolean load,

                                  java.lang.String strategyName,
                                  boolean savePort)
        Description copied from interface: Features
        Creates a regular buying strategy for the portfolio.
        Specified by:
        createStrategyRegular in interface Features
        Parameters:
        tickerSymbol - the symbol of the stock
        amount - the amount worth of stocks to be bought.
        commission - the commission per transaction
        dateTime - datetime at which it is bought.
        save - whether user wants to save this strategy.
        apply - whether user wants to execute this strategy.
        load - whether portfolio is loaded from disk
        portfolioInfo - the name or path of the portfolio.
        strategyName - unique name of the strategy.
        savePort - whether portfolio is to be saved after execution

        loadPortfolio - whether portfolio is loaded from the disk.

        strategyPath - the path of strategy file.
